body_html:
Hi,
I am having the same problem:
I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:141] Couldn't open CUDA library libcupti.so.9.1. LD_LIBRARY_PATH: /usr/local/nccl_2.1.15-1+cuda9.1_x86_64/lib:/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64

F tensorflow/compiler/xla/statusor.cc:33] Attempting to fetch value instead of handling error Failed precondition: could not dlopen DSO: libcupti.so.9.1; dlerror: libcupti.so.9.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

I installed tensorflow (version 1.8.0) from source. Seems like tensorflow is attempting to look for libcupti.so.9.1, whereas I have libcupti.so.9.2 installed.

Any clues what to do in this case? Thanks in advance.

I installed tensorflow (version 1.8.0) from source. Seems like tensorflow is attempting to look for libcupti.so.9.1, whereas I have libcupti.so.9.2 installed.
Any clues what to do in this case? Thanks in advance.
body:
Hi,
I am having the same problem:
`I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:141] Couldn't open CUDA library libcupti.so.9.1. LD_LIBRARY_PATH: /usr/local/nccl_2.1.15-1+cuda9.1_x86_64/lib:/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64`

`F tensorflow/compiler/xla/statusor.cc:33] Attempting to fetch value instead of handling error Failed precondition: could not dlopen DSO: libcupti.so.9.1; dlerror: libcupti.so.9.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory`

I installed tensorflow (version 1.8.0) from source. Seems like tensorflow is attempting to look for `libcupti.so.9.1`, whereas I have `libcupti.so.9.2` installed.

Any clues what to do in this case? Thanks in advance.
